title: Start
body:
???: Excuse me, Dr. Scientist, do you have a moment?
[[Uh... Sure.|Yes]]
[[...|NoResponse]]
[[What?|Repeat]]

title: Repeat
body:
Mouse: Do you have a moment?
[[Ok, sure.|NoResponse]]
[[Not really|EndConvo]]

title: Monologue
body:
Squeakers: I would like to talk to you about all this zapping. Do you think there is a lower setting? It kinda hurts.
[[I think I could do that.|TurnDownZap]]
[[I'm not sure...|DoNothing]]
[[It's part of the experiment, I don't think I can do that|Refuse]]

title: TurnDownZap
body:
Squeakers: Great! I'm gonna keep trying my best with these learning tunnels. Back to work!
[[EndConvo]]

title: DoNothing
body:
Squeakers: Ok well, if you find anything, I'd really appreciate it!
[[EndConvo]]

title: Refuse
body:
Squeakers: Oh, I see. It just really hurts, y'know? If you really think it needs to be this high, I can bear it a little longer I guess.
[[EndConvo]]
